name: Leo's Red Carpet Rampage
summary: GET LEO THE ULTIMATE AWARD OR DIE TRYING IN LEO’S RED CARPET RAMPAGE, AN ARCADE STYLE PLATFORM GAME WHERE YOU RACE DOWN THE RED CARPET ON A QUEST FOR THE ULTIMATE AWARD. COLLECT AS MANY EMMY’S AND GOLDEN GLOBES AS YOU CAN ALONG THE WAY. BUT BEWARE OF PUSHY PHOTOGRAPHERS AND WATCH OUT FOR LADY GAGA... AND ICEBERGS
info:
• 游戏类型: 平台游戏
  • 游玩人数: 1人
  • 售价: 免费
  • 官方网站: http://redcarpetrampage.com/
  • 制作: The Line animation, Max van der Merwe, Electric Theatre
